getNodeContext: D-VPN is a new type if decentralized P2P VPN. As long as you invite other users to use D-VPN, the user you invited and other users invited by the user can become your node. This hierarchical relationship can last up to 10 levels.
getNodesum: The more people you invite, the more available nodes you have.
DVPNCryptocurrency: DVPN will issue FWC (Free World Coin). The more users you invite and the longer you use it, the more cryptocurrency you will get.
